cs524.racetrack.viewer

Class Waypoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs524.racetrack.viewer.Waypoint

  • public class Waypoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a waypoint on the racetrack.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [22.02.13]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Waypoint

        public Waypoint(java.lang.String id,
        int x,
        int y,
        int trackWidth)
        Creates a waypoint object. The units are arbitrary, but for our task, they map as pixel coordinates with (0,0) at the top left of the window.
        Parameters:
        id - - the identifier
        x - - the x position
        y - - the y position
        trackWidth - - track width

    • Method Detail

      • calculateEdges

        public void calculateEdges(Waypoint waypointPrev,
                  Waypoint waypointNext)
        Calculates the inner and outer edges of this waypoint.
        Parameters:
        waypointPrev - - the previous waypoint
        waypointNext - - the next waypoint

        Gets the anchor coordinate.

      • getEdgeInside

        public java.awt.Point getEdgeInside()
        Gets the inside edge point. The edges must have been calculated before call this; otherwise, an assertion error occurs.
        Returns:
        the edge point

      • getEdgeOutside

        public java.awt.Point getEdgeOutside()
        Gets the inside edge point. The edges must have been calculated before call this; otherwise, an assertion error occurs.
        Returns:
        the edge point
